data.message:
Hello! I need to know if you really sent this message into a comment on my fan page: 
Faceƅook notificaƚion
19 h · 
Notification : Your account will be disabled !!
For security reasons, your account will be disabled permanent because the accounts have been reported by other users,And another reason that is not allowed on Facebook.
Please make your account recovery, for the cancellation of blocking.
Confirmation below to recover your account :
http://cutt.us/help_recovery
"Attention"
If you ignore this message, Your account will be permanently deactivated automatically by our system's security.
Sorry to interrupt your convenience.
The Facebook Safety Team.
© Facebook Inc. 7811 Menlo Park, California, CA, 94043 ---- I need an answer please. Thanks a lot!

replies.message: Hi The Greeting Shop, this looks like a hoax. We recommend that you do not provide any personal information to the sender and report the spam to us by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1fTr2lt. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Kelsey
